findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions _distributeBNBReward(), addExemptWalletFromBNBRewards(), getData(), removeIndexFromRewardArray(), and _transfer() use loops that could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long addresses list.
findings.location: _distributeBNBReward(), addExemptWalletFromBNBRewards(), getData(), removeIndexFromRewardArray(), and _transfer() in the smart contract
